name: Side Battles
description:
Side Battles.

Defend your Boss cyber tank with tanks and other units that you deploy on the battle ground. Earn points to buy more units to eliminate your opponent. Easy, Med and Hard levels. Each level has more ground space.

This game "SIDE BATTLES" is like a mixed Tower Defense game with Red Alert.

for 1 or 2 players

Thank you for playing and I look forward to hearing your feedback.
